BaseTemplate.description: Simple rental property management for property owners
BaseTemplate.made_with: Made with <author></author> by the RentTrackr team.

Index.meta_title: RentTrackr - Simple Rental Property Management for Property Owners
Index.meta_description: Manage your rental properties with ease. Track rent, maintenance, tenants, and payments all in one simple place. Built for property owners who value simplicity.
Index.hero_title: Managing Your Rental Properties Made Simple
Index.hero_subtitle: Keep track of rent payments, maintenance, and tenant information all in one easy-to-use place. No complicated software—just straightforward property management.
Index.features_title: Everything You Need in One Place
Index.features_subtitle: Simple tools to help you stay organized and stress-free
Index.feature_rent_tracking_description: See who's paid and who hasn't at a glance. Set up automatic reminders so you never miss a payment.
Index.feature_maintenance_description: Keep a complete history of repairs and maintenance for each property. Know exactly what was done and when.
Index.feature_tenant_info_description: Store contact details, lease dates, and important documents safely. Find what you need in seconds.
Index.feature_reminders_description: Get notified when rent is due or when payments are late. Stay on top of your cash flow effortlessly.
Index.feature_reports_description: View clear summaries of your income and expenses. Perfect for tax time or just checking how you're doing.
Index.feature_security_description: Your information is protected with bank-level security. Only you can access your data.
Index.trust_description: RentTrackr was designed specifically for property owners who want simplicity without sacrificing functionality. No confusing menus, no technical jargon—just a straightforward way to manage your properties with confidence.
Index.footer_tagline: Simple property management for peace of mind.

Counter.security_powered_by: Security, bot detection and rate limiting powered by

CounterForm.presentation: The counter is stored in the database and incremented by the value you provide.

About.meta_title: About RentTrackr - Our Story and Mission
About.meta_description: Learn about RentTrackr's mission to help property owners manage their rentals with simplicity, clarity, and confidence.
About.about_paragraph_1: RentTrackr was created with one simple goal: to help property owners manage their rental properties without the stress and confusion that often comes with complicated software.
About.about_paragraph_2: We understand that not everyone wants to spend hours learning complex systems. That's why we built RentTrackr to be straightforward, easy to understand, and genuinely helpful for property owners of all ages and technical backgrounds.
About.about_paragraph_3: Whether you own one property or several, RentTrackr gives you the tools you need to stay organized, track important information, and manage your rentals with confidence.
About.mission_statement: To provide property owners with a simple, accessible, and reliable platform that takes the complexity out of rental property management—so you can focus on what matters most.
About.value_simplicity_description: We believe good software should be easy to use. No hidden features, no confusing menus—just clear, helpful tools that work the way you expect them to.
About.value_accessibility_description: We design with all users in mind, ensuring that text is easy to read, buttons are clearly labeled, and navigation is intuitive.
About.value_trust_description: Your data is important to us. We use industry-standard security practices to keep your information safe and private.
About.contact_text: Have questions or need help? We're here for you.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.
